custom/steelseries.label: {percentage}%
custom/steelseries.execute: headsetcontrol -d 0x1038:0x1290 -b | awk -F': ' '/Level/ {print $2}' | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' | xargs -I{} echo '{"percentage": {}}' || echo ''

custom/github.label: {count}
custom/github.execute: gh api notifications --jq 'length' 2>/dev/null | xargs -I{} echo '{"count": {}}' || echo ''
